Data in Yoda is not directly accessible, you have to download data to the machine that contains your analysis software first. If you do your analysis with Python scripts anyway, for example on [Snellius](/topics/snellius.qmd) or [Ada](/topics/ada.qmd), it can be useful to script the data transfer as well.
